text: Getting Ready for Spring with My Favorite Walmart Fashion Finds Spring is suppose to be here… and let me tell you—I can feel it in my soul. There’s something so refreshing about this season… the longer days, the chirping birds, and that first day you can step outside without a jacket and feel the sun on your skin. It always gives me the itch to freshen things up—not just around the house, but in my wardrobe, too. And one of my favorite places to find affordable, on-trend pieces that still feel like me? Walmart. You all know I love sharing cozy home finds from there, but their fashion pieces lately have completely wowed me. Whether I’m running errands, heading out for a little lunch date with Jose, or just looking for a comfy outfit that still feels put together, Walmart has been a go-to for cute, budget-friendly spring staples. Effortless Denim You’ll Reach for Again and Again These Jessica Simpson Freesia Wide-Leg Cuff Jeans are such a flattering, wear-anywhere style—perfect for dressing up with a pretty blouse or keeping casual with a cozy tee. I love the wide-leg silhouette paired with the cuffed hem… it’s the kind of effortless denim that instantly makes your outfit feel elevated without even trying. Pretty & Practical: Handbags That Pull Every Look Together Whether I’m running errands, heading out on a little weekend trip, or just want something pretty to pair with my everyday outfit—these Walmart handbags have truly impressed me. From classic totes and timeless crossbodies to stylish backpacks that hold all the things, each piece blends function with a little bit of charm. I love that they feel elevated without the high price tag, and they make it so easy to stay organized and stylish on the go. These are the kind of accessories that quietly pull your whole look together—and make getting out the door feel a little more fun. Everyday Spring Comfort: Cute, Casual, and Ready to Go Lately, I’ve been all about embracing easy, everyday comfort—and these Walmart fashion finds totally hit the mark. From sporty sneakers and laid-back slides to comfy joggers and trendy sandals, each piece feels perfect for those in-between spring days when you’re bouncing between cozy and out-the-door ready. Whether you’re heading to the farmer’s market, walking the pups, or just sipping your morning coffee on the porch, these pieces are made to move with you while still keeping things cute. And the best part? They’re all super budget-friendly without sacrificing style. Everyday Spring Favorites There’s something so special about getting dressed in the spring—the air feels lighter, the colors feel softer, and it’s the perfect time to lean into flowy dresses, feminine details, and effortless one-pieces. These Walmart finds are full of sweet textures, romantic sleeves, and flattering fits that make getting ready feel like a treat again. Whether you’re dressing up for a weekend brunch or just want to feel a little extra put together during your everyday routines, these pieces bring that perfect balance of ease and charm we all crave this time of year. And of course… we close out some of our favorites with the coziest thing in our closet—PJs. After all the daytime fun, there’s nothing better than slipping into something soft, comfy, and just plain cozy. These pajama picks from Walmart are not only adorable, but they’re the kind of pieces that make your evening wind-down feel like a little self-care ritual. Perfect for slow mornings, movie nights, or just curling up with a good book—they’re truly the cherry on top of any spring wardrobe refresh. If you’re looking for more daily inspiration—whether it’s cozy fashion, home décor, or little joys from everyday life—you can always find me over here. Let’s keep welcoming spring together, one lovely detail at a time. xxLizMarie
